lead_paragraph: Nigeria and Equatorial Guinea signed an agreement to establish combined patrols to bolster security in the Gulf of Guinea, which has been plagued by piracy in the last few years, a spokesman for Nigeria's president said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Nigeria and Equatorial Guinea Sign Maritime Security Agreement
headline.print_headline: Nigeria and Equatorial Guinea Sign Maritime Security Agreement

snippet: Nigeria and Equatorial Guinea signed an agreement to establish combined patrols to bolster security in the Gulf of Guinea, which has been plagued by piracy in the last few years, a spokesman for Nigeria's president said on Wednesday.
